html:
Drizzling rains
Growing buds
Theyâ€™ll be flowers
Flowers of roses
Crawling worms
Under the stones
Along with beetles
Feeding on the side
A galloping horse
Snorting a bit
Will take the rider
To the destiny
Pillows of silk
That feel so good
They will make you
Fall asleep well
title: Flowers of rose
